name: Swiper (Quentin Cudel, NeuroneZero, Dimitri Jacobson, Stephen Siba, Lea Roulee, Anthony Lemaire, Robin Jung--Hermeline)
name_original: Swiper (Quentin Cudel, NeuroneZero, Dimitri Jacobson, Stephen Siba, Lea Roulee, Anthony Lemaire, Robin Jung--Hermeline)
description:
Hello there ! Welcome to this page !

     Swiper is a F2P roguelite with card mecanics designed for mobile. 
You embody a tiny robot called Swiper, just like the game title, who fights against the evil hord.

     Don't miss Fusion Cards, they will really help you go through the levels.
Don't ignore your merchant friend and be careful of the elites and the boss !

Enjoy by yourself the challenges that Swiper offer to you.
Time to Swipe !
